0101011001011001 1101001001011101 0 -> sum: 0010100010110110, cout: 1

0000101011111110 0111011001000001 0 -> sum: 1000000100111111, cout: 0
0100101111111011 1000111100111110 0 -> sum: 1101101100111001, cout: 0
